name: Shov Station (Dev)
description:
Shov Station

Make sure the trains run on time by making space for the incoming passengers ! Don't let them fall on the tracks though !

Left Click - Shove towards the train   Right Click - Shove towards the platform  

The desktop version has better performance ! 

Update:

Chrome browser: most issues seem to be fleshed out, works better... worst case, still try firefox.
